body.p:
Boston Jany. 31. 1861
Jas. W. Tate Esqr
asst Secty. of State
Frankfort Ky.
Dr Sir

Yours of the 14" is recd. and I owe you an apology for the delay in forwarding my oath and the fee of your office. when my commission was received I immediately executed the oath and laid it away with the commn. and not being calld upon to act as a commr. for your State in the mean time, it has remained undisturbed 'till now -- which your letter reminds me of -- I enclose the oath and Five dollars as fee. -- You will oblige me by acknowledging receipt of the same.

Very respectfully
Yours &c
Sam. S. Curtis.
